name: DMMod
savepath: Two sources of half freeze duration now stack into cannot be frozen, shield/boots base damage and strength/dex scaling increased to have parity with other weapons after they were buffed in DMMod 1.00, new

cube recipe for rare/unique weapons/armor, slight changes to magical affixes, lots of bug fixes to Uber monster stats, skills, and other stuff. Some small skill changes and set/unique item stat changes.
